item.title: Ex-OpenAI CTO Mira Murati unveils Thinking Machines: A startup focused on multimodality, human-AI collaboration
item.description: The OpenAI rival will focus on strong infrastructure, multimodality and human-AI collaboration (as opposed to purely agentic systems).

item.title: AI can fix bugs—but can’t find them: OpenAI’s study highlights limits of LLMs in software engineering
item.description: A new test from OpenAI researchers found that LLMs were unable to resolve some freelance coding tests, failing to earn full value.

item.title: Elon Musk just released an AI that’s smarter than ChatGPT — here’s why that matters
item.description: Elon Musk's xAI launches Grok 3, outperforming ChatGPT and Google Gemini in benchmarks with 200,000 GPUs and advanced reasoning capabilities, intensif...

item.title: Out-analyzing analysts: OpenAI’s Deep Research pairs reasoning LLMs with agentic RAG to automate work — and replace jobs
item.description: OpenAI’s Deep Research pairs advanced reasoning LLMs with agentic RAG, delivering automated reports that rival human analysts — at a fraction of the c...

item.title: Talus integrates Sui to power AI agents
item.description: Talus, the next-gen platform for onchain AI agents, is joining forces with Sui, the blockchain which says it's built for mass adoption.
